name: Bizzon Info Solutions ( B-On)
description:
Bizzon Info Solutions Private Limited (B-On) a leading fastest growing global provider of process-driven IT solutions for global 1000 companies. We adopt Six Sigma practices for developing our client centric processes.Our certifications and practices provide a qualified foundation for all our service offerings and enable our clients to benefit internally. Our continued rapid growth is a testament to the certainty our clients experience every day.

A leader and innovator in analytics and business intelligence since 2007, has successfully implemented web optimization, analytic and data mining solutions for a wide range of industries including top MNCs across the globe. 
We understand that the most complex challenges facing today's businesses demand real-world results. B-On Group has been helping its clients create business value by providing business analysis, planning, design, and implementation. 
We add real value to global organizations through domain expertise plus solutions with proven success in the field and world-class service. Work with small, medium and large organizations around the world to build customized tailored enterprise applications following the agile methodology. Our presence is global, so we can co-locate onsite with you, or work from one of our onshore or offshore delivery centres or both – we will adapt to your needs as we go.
